WriteMessage: From my experience as an Editor-in-Chief and as a hobbyist writer, I write Editorials, Literary Works, and Features for all fronts.
DevelopMessage: As a means to pursue my game development dream and out of necessity, I develop in C/C++, C#, and in Python for console and some GUI's.
DesignMessage: To rekindle my artistic side and to aid me in my other endeavors, I edit videos and audio, create animations and logos, and sketch for fun!
